Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.annotations

Annotation Type RequiredInterfaces

  • @Retention(RUNTIME)
@Target(TYPE)
public @interface RequiredInterfaces
    The annotation RequiredInterface put on a component definition class tells BCM that this component is requiring all of the interfaces given in the array.

    Description

    The BCM component baseline component constructor will automatically add the given interfaces to the list of required interfaces of the newly created component.

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2017-12-12

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element Description
      java.lang.Class<? extends RequiredCI>[] required
      array of Java interfaces that are the required component interfaces to be added to the component holding the annotation.

    • Element Detail

      • required

        java.lang.Class<? extends RequiredCI>[] required
        array of Java interfaces that are the required component interfaces to be added to the component holding the annotation.

        Contract

         pre    true                    // no precondition.
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Returns:
        array of Java interfaces that are the required component interfaces.
